page.title: 16A Day in My Life_Lynn
page.content: When I wake in the morning I wash and dress myself.I eat my breakfast in the kitchen with my family.When I get ready for school I go to the bus shelter with my friend to catch the bus. In school I say the Lord's prayer before starting my Maths,English, Spelling and Project Work.This term I am working on the Domesday Project which has allowed me to go on visits and work on the computer. My school day begins at 9.15am and I have a twenty minute interval before lunch.In the afternoon I may practise netball or do handwork.At 3.30pm I go home by bus.Before dinner I do my homework and afterwards play rounders or football with my friends.After supper I usually go to bed at ten o'clock.
